resources.string: Welcome to Alchemy. This app helps you discover and donate to charities in your country. Only Ireland is supported for now - but hopefully more countries are on the way.\n\n Tap a charity to see the donation options, and tap again to make a donation using your phone credit. You will get a message from the donation handling company confirming your donation was successful.

This is an app which collects charity donation phone numbers and presents them in a nice way to help you find causes you\'re interested in.\n The charity information is sourced from https://api.likecharity.com/charities/ . All donations are processed by LikeCharity, who have no association whatsoever with this app.\n Currently this app is restricted to use in Ireland, but hopefully other APIs will be added soon.
Donations made through this app come out of your credit. Alchemy does not handle any of your money - it is sent straight to the listed donation number for the charity.
